name: Aquarium Simulator
description: If you ever wanted your own aquarium, but could not get it. This game is for you, take care of your own aquarium and compete with your friends, which of you is richer. Do not forget, your aquarium lives even when you turn off the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Storage: 2 GB available space
